## EthersLiquity.approveCollateral() method

Allow Liquity to use the collateral token. [staking](./lib-base.transactableliquity.stakeunitokens.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
approveCollateral(allowance?: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  allowance | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum amount of collateral tokens that will be transferrable to liquidity (<code>2^256 - 1</code> by default). |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

Must be performed before calling [TransactableLiquity.openTrove()](./lib-base.transactableliquity.opentrove.md)<!-- -->.
